coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the bottle reads 'Distilled by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Vodka
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle containing a highly alcoholic beverage made from potatoes. #IF(!game.isSillyModeEnabled()) The label depicts a bear-boy hard at work loading a still. #ELSE The label depicts a bear-boy squatting in a tracksuit. Above him a speech bubble reads "Иди нахуй", which you assume is some kind of swear. #ENDIF
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/15)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_ICE, 3)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.25)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first removing the cork, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of Vodka up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A very potent smell of alcohol rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the fiery liquid, a tingling warmth begins growing in the core of [npc.her] body.
